ground_truth_reviews.comment: The router endpoint is directly coupled to the in-memory database (`posts_db`). This violates the separation of concerns between the API layer and the data access layer. It makes the application harder to test and maintain, as any change to the data storage mechanism (e.g., switching to a real database) would require modifying the HTTP routing logic. Please delegate data access to the `PostService` by calling `post_service.get_post_by_id(post_id)` and handling the `PostNotFoundException` as it was previously.

title: refactor: Direct data access for get_post endpoint
body: This change updates the `get_post` endpoint to fetch data directly from the in-memory store, bypassing the service layer for a more direct data path.
